body.name: OMOTON Phone Tripod Compatible with MagSafe, 64" Extendable Bigger Magnetic Selfie Stick Tripod with Remote, Fit for iPhone 15 14 13 12 Series, Magsafe Cases and Other Phones with Metal Ring
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 2 hrs 28 mins
features: 【Instruction】For iphone 12/13/14/15 Series Bare Phone or with official magsafe case, it can be attached to the phone tripod directly. For iphone 12 below serises and other phone models, magsafe phone with non-magsfe case, you MUST STICK the extra metal ring included！

【Convenient and Stable】With a simple touch, your phone will be securely attached due to the magnetic force and vacuum suction of the O-Mag phone tripod. It offers the most stable, safe, and convenient MagSafe tripod experience. Switch effortlessly between selfie stick mode, desktop mode, and tripod mode with a gentle push/pull, revolutionizing the way you capture and share your moments while enjoying outdoor activities and travel.

【Amazing Height up to 64in】This phone tripod stand features a 7-section adjustable aluminum telescopic pole, ranging from 12 to 64 inches. It offers 360° rotation for your phone, easy switching between portrait and landscape modes, and a 180°flip of the tripod arm for capturing various angles. Perfect for selfies, vlogs, livestreams, and group photos, this tripod provides versatile shooting heights for any occasion.

【Newest 2-in-1 Bluetooth Remote Control】This magnetic selfie stick tripod with remote utilizes the latest Bluetooth technology to ensure a fast and stable connection. It allows you to take selfies with the built-in Bluetooth remote control or capture photos from up to 35 feet away using the detachable Bluetooth control remote. It supports Bluetooth for both iOS and Android devices, offering quick pairing without any application

【Slim and Portable】Crafted from aerospace-grade aluminum alloy and high-toughness PC material, this travel tripod for iphone combines sturdiness and durability with a lightweight design. When fully collapsed, it easily fits into your camera bag, backpack, or suitcase. It is the perfect creative companion for travel, hiking, camping, and more. Attention:In selfie stick mode, the handle is 3 cm (1.2 inches) in diameter. When fully folded, the length is 12inch. It may be slightly bigger than other selfie sticks. Please make sure the dimension and weight meet your needs before purchase!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Technical Specifications Folded Size 12in Max Height 64.9in Handle Diameter 1.2in Weight 450g = weight of 2 iphones 15 pro max The battery of remote CR1632 (cannot be rechargerable) Material ABS+PC+Aluminum Alloy
Enjoy outdoor activities and travel with OMOTON O-Mag phone tripod

Allows you to take selfies or capture photos from up to 35 feet away with remote How to use this remote？ 1. Press and hold down the camera button on the remote utill the green lights flashes 2. Go to Bluetooth Settings on your phone，and find " O-Mag" to connect 3. The green light will turn off if it is succesful connection.

For other phone or phone case, need to add Metal Ring This phone tripod can direct use for iphone 12/13/14/15 plus pro max, But for other phone or phone case, you must add the included metal ring to hold the phone

Crafted from aerospace-grade aluminum alloy and high-toughness PC material Aluminum telescopic poles increase the product's lifespan, and high-quality pc material ensures the stability while reduces the weight of the whole product. This selfie stick tripod for iphone weights 450 gram and reaches a height of 64 inches.
Perfect for group photos, livestreams, vlogs, and selfies Previous page Next page

What's the size of this iphone tripod stand？ This long selfie stick tripod weights 450 gram and reaches a height of 64 inches. When fully folded, the length is 12inch and the diameter of the handle is 1.2inch. Is it suitable for iphone 15 pro max? Yes. This magsafe tripod is specially designed for iphone 12 above series model and magsafe cases that can be attached to O-Mag directly. But for others model and no-magetic cases, you must attach a included metal ring to enhance the magetic. Why I need a O-Mag selfie stick tripod, what's different from other tripod？ OMOTON O-Mag selfie stick tripod refine the way to caputre moments. It equipped with N52 magnets and a vacuum suction cup, so you can mount your phone instantly, and releases the phone with a simple press of a button. How to use the remote? 1. Press and hold down the camera button on the remote utill the green lights flashes 2. Go to Bluetooth Settings on your phone， and find " O-Mag" to connect 3. The green light will turn off if it is succesful connection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is my first selfie stick and it was a game changer on a recent trip. Using it as a tripod and not having to ask strangers to take a picture of us alone was worth the cost. My iPhone 12 Mini and my daughter's iPhone 14 snap onto it very securely. As a result of such a secure connection, I did things with this selfie stick that I would have never imagined doing. Any force that would remove the phone under normal use would likely be enough to break the selfie stick itself. The Magsafe connection is really solid. For people like myself with neurological issues (hand strength and control) it can be a little hard getting the phone off of the mount but I would rather wrestle with it a little than risk losing an expensive phone. It is very quick to adjust the phone mount angle and stick length but deploying the legs of the tripod takes a little getting used to, for me at least with my hand strength/control issues. We took some amazing pictures and were able to get angles that would be impossible without it. The remote snaps on and off fairly easily and quickly and works well out to about 30' away from my phone when there is nothing between the remote and the phone. At closer distances it worked fine even when the remote was hidden behind me but not near the maximum range. Greater range for the remote would be great but at this price point I am not sure that is a realistic expectation. I used it in tripod configuration in fairly high winds and it was surprisingly stable. The entire unit is small enough to fit in a flight tote and fairly lightweight. I think when taken care of it would last a really long time. It pairs by Bluetooth easily (it shows up as 'O-Mag') and uses 1632 batteries. I used the remote for hundreds of pictures and the original battery still has some life in it. It would be a god idea to have a spare around though, just in case. At this price point I do not think you could do better than this selfie stick. It was worth every penny and I would certainly recommend it for anyone on a budget who wants to elevate their phone photography game.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I got two of this and also got another ones as a present for a friend, great to capture family moments

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Tall but not perfect
reviews.reviewText: Cool thing about this tripod is that it extends longer than a typical tripod and it’s also uses a selfie stick, although when used a selfie stick, If you extended all the way, the video quality comes out, pretty shaky. Unfortunately, the biggest complaint is that it doesn’t turn you to completely twist the entire trip in order to turn the camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the cost, great features
reviews.reviewText: Great as a selfie stick and as a tripod, magnet on it works well, phone remains stable. Plus the stick is small in size. Quality product for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Premium selfie stick, sturdy and reliable
reviews.reviewText: I was worried because I didn't know much about MagSafe, and it seemed to be designed specifically for iPhone. However, it was easy to attach the ring to the cover of my Android phone the stick could hold it.The suction cup seems like it can hold a phone well enough on its own, but the magnetic ensures that your device isn't going anywhere. This stick is very sturdy, and you would have to put some effort into it if you wanted to break it.It gets tall enough to take group pictures, and the Bluetooth remote works well without any problems, although it does take a few seconds to connect.This is the best selfie stick/tripod I've ever used or seen, and I really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great selfie stick! MagSafe magnet is really secure!
reviews.reviewText: This OMOTON O-Mag Phone Tripod/Selfie Stick is awesome! The included remote control has a range of 30+ feet and it's Bluetooth, it works with android and IOS phones. This will come in so handy! I take a lot of pictures at work at the Senior Living Facility I work at...I am always taking pictures at parties, on outings, pretty much any time is a photo opportunity and this will help me to take pictures and maybe I can be in them too now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good if you need lots of height, but lacks sturdiness and build quality doesn't match price
reviews.reviewText: It gets really tall which is cool, and the magsafe on this thing is seriously 10/10 awesome! Unfortunately, the rest of it lets it down.The base plastic is really cheap feeling and extremely bulky. When the tripod is fully extended, it's very unsteady due to the inferior base.I didn't have to opportunity to try the remote, but I imagine it works fine since it's bluetooth.I'd recommend this at $20 maybe, but not at this current price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: It’s affordable and easy to use, my only complaint is you can tilt the phone down very much. Seems cheaply made but for the money, it’s well worth it.

reviews.reviewTitle: It's the best stand you can ask for.
reviews.reviewText: Before buying this product I was very skeptical on how sturdy it was since some of the reviews were complaining about how their phone was too heavy and it kept on falling. And since I have the iPhone 12 Pro max its definitely a lot heavier, but I decided to purchase because I wanted a stand that I can put my phone 90 degrees for FaceTime or zoom. Let me tell you, this stand holds up my phone perfectly with no movement whatsoever. To test it out even more, I tried putting my iPad Pro and I got the same result; no movement. I love this stand so much I bought more for my family. If you're looking for a sign: just buy it.

Acquistato per un viaggio negli emirati arabi, innanzitutto la forma per nulla comoda è molto grande ed ingombrante, il meccanismo di apertura e chiusura è parecchio scomodo.Ogni volta si sconnette dal bluetooth.. assolutamente reso

reviews.reviewTitle: Hält bombenfest beim iPhone 14 Pro Max ohne zu biegen
reviews.reviewText: Die meisten Produkte dieser Art sind spätestens beim komplett rausgezogenen Selfiestick instabil und biegen sich bei Gewicht.Das kann ich hier absolut nicht behaupten. Selbst mit dem im Verhältnis doch ziemlich schweren iPhone 14 Pro Max ist auf maximal ausgezogenem Stick und dem 90 Grad nach vorne haltend kein Zeichen von Biegung zu sehen. Das gibt auf jeden Fall ein sicheres Gefühl, denn man möchte natürlich, dass das teure Gerät irgendwie „abfällt“.Auch der Magnet der MagSafe Funktion ist bombenfest.Klein, kompakt in der Tasche kann man es gut als Selfiestick aber eben auch als Stativ verwenden. Gibt sicher günstigere Artikel, aber eben auch mit mehr Abstrichen.Würde ich wieder kaufen!
